emuInput.TitMainTitle: Boys holding up signs reading "Give for the life of a child / March of Dimes," from left, front row: Tyler Thompson, Paul Sheard, Gary Gilmore, William Scott, and Gary Stevens; second row: Clifford Nicholson, James Bright, Ronald Peters, Howard Humphries, Calvin Humphries, Ronald Sheard, Robert Dawin, and Ernest Pollard; back row: Tyrone Scott and Jerry Tate, posed in interior, possibly Hill City
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1963, pg.13 reads;" Marchers- Joining the mothers in their March of Dimes, these Hill City lads collected a total of $17.64. Front row: Tyler Thompson, Paul Sheard, Gary Gilmore, William Scott and Gary Stevens.  Second row; Clifford Nicholson, James Bright, Ronald Peters, Howard Humphries, Calvin Humphries, Ronald Sheard, Robert Dawin and Ernest Pollard.  Third row; Tyrone Scott and Jerry Tate."
